name: Kaelen Swiftbow
title: The Silent Arrow

features.title: Favored Enemy
features.desc: You have advantage on Wisdom (Survival) checks to track constructs, as well as on Intelligence checks to recall information about them.

features.title: Hunter's Prey: Colossus Slayer
features.desc: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, the creature takes an extra 1d8 damage if it's below its hit point maximum.

features.title: Fey Ancestry
features.desc: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

equipment: Leather armor, a longbow with 20 arrows, two scimitars, an explorer's pack, a hunting trap, and a pouch with 10 gp.

personality.traits: I'm driven by a wanderlust that led me away from home. I watch over my friends as if they were a litter of newborn pups.
personality.ideal: Nature. The natural world is more important than all the constructs of civilization.
personality.bond: I am the last of my tribe, and it is up to me to ensure their traditions are not forgotten.
personality.flaw: I am slow to trust. Those who seem friendly are the ones I trust least.

spells.name: Hunter's Mark
spells.desc: As a bonus action, choose a creature. You deal an extra 1d6 damage to the target whenever you hit it with a weapon attack, and you have advantage on any Wisdom (Perception) or Wisdom (Survival) check you make to find it.

spells.name: Cure Wounds
spells.desc: A creature you touch regains 1d8 + WIS modifier hit points.

spells.name: Entangle
spells.desc: Grasping weeds and vines sprout from the ground in a 20-foot square, making it difficult terrain. Creatures in the area must succeed a STR save or be restrained.
